Title: The feelings of friendship between the peoples of China and Africa are deep
Designer: Changzhoushi gongnongbing meishu chuangzuo xuexiban (常州市工农兵美术创作学习班)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Most of China's aid to revolutionary movements in Africa is kept low-profile. Medical aid can be 'advertised' more freely.
